После часа пройденного в этой игре могу многое о ней рассказать. Игра мне понравилась это точно, но это ещё не всё.
  Плюсы:
- Мясо, кровь, кишки, там этого довольно много.
- Хоррорная обстановка, огромное количество карт.
- Разнообразие оружий и скинов.
- Мультиплеер с 6 людьмы.
- Лучшая оптимизация. На старейшем ноутбуке идёт на высокой графике.
  
 Минусы:
- Много доната, его очень много.
- Быстро надоедает играть.

ピーク越えてしまったゲームなので人口が少ない難点がありますがFFがないので
気軽にオンライン参加可能ノーマルからハードあたりは初めての人でも普通に遊べる。
雑魚から大物までヘッドショット以外はハズレと同義というゲームなのでHSとは何かを教えてくれる。
腕上げたらSuicialへ物足りなくなったらHoEでcoopゲー究極の難易度を体験出来ます。
このゲームは独特の爽快感がありSuicidalから新しい楽しさが発見出来HoEでの
全力全開限界の処理は格別で本格的に楽しくなるのはHoEからと言えます。
6人で協力し処理を分担しないと潰れるゲームなのでcoopゲーとしての完成度が高く
連携密度の関係で良さそうなプレイヤーを見つけたらフレンド申請を相互で行うという
ゲーム外での交流も盛んです。私はこのゲームのおかげでフレンドが沢山出来ました。
すでに続編が出ていますがKilling Floor 2 Digital Deluxe Editionを買うと本作が
ついてくるので先にKF2を買う手もあります。是非1の空気に触れて欲しいと思います。
DLCはなくても十分遊べますのでセールにて単体買いでも問題ありません。

Des vagues de zombies, des flingues en tout genre. Un but : le massacre. Que demander de mieux ? Un boss ultra cheater a la fin qui viens vous démonter ou il faut être sur ses gardes pour le battre ? Eh bien oui également

Killing Floor provides the perfect experience to anyone who ever loved any classic horde mode in games. With diverse enemies it requires the player to act differently according to each situation, which adds to the replayablity. Killing Floor also has a lively community of mods and map that will completely give you a new experience of the game. As much as I like the combat it's important to note that weapons don't feel as unique as they should. It ends up as though classes only offer a minor difference in play style. The only drastic class difference is the berserker which focuses on melee weapons and closs combat. 

Killing Floor is a game that is best served with company as you do rely on teamwork on the harder difficulties more but however the game still is quite fun alone. 

Another grievance I have is the pointless DlC's, I wish they focused on leveling up to unlock characters or by doing special tasks like what they with SteamPunk Mr. Foster. I also think weapon DLC's are a cash grab too and it feels like to have the full experience of a veteran player you have to purchase such things, but I digress.

Overall I recommend this game for all lovers of gory horde gameplay.
THE GORE IS REAL
If you've enjoyed zombie games of the past and want to see a different take on what cooperative zombie horror games should be like, then I think you will enjoy Killing Floor too.

Про эту игру я еще слышал очень довно, но все не как не решился ее купить, и вот в один прекрасный день я думал что же купить, и вспомнил о кильке, еще раз посмотрел трейлер, ну что бы не облажатся с игрой, и купил ее! запустил играю и сразу 100500 игр в микcе смешаных между собой, короче что то похожее на pain killer, хотя для меня килька это и местами похожая игра на Half-life 2, тут тебе и покупка оружий как в Call of Duty в зомби режиме ну может и не так я не играл, но слышал про такое, тут тебе и Сириус сэм, и даже игра напоминает местами F.E.A.R, вообщем я не желею что отдал свои деньги за такую игру, игра просто замечательная, как шутер, для тех кому не надоедает стрелять по мутантам самое то, вообщем если вы хотите с друзьями наказать всех монстров когда либо пугавших вас в детсве, живущих под вашими кроватями, то это игра для вас !

One of the greatest Games ever made. If you want a game where you think you are going to die with each second you draw breath, each corner you turn, every bullet you miss, yet pull through using only your wits and weapon skills, this is your game. You will be forced to the extreams, put up against immesurable odds, and driven to the only logical mentality inside this scenario, insanity. Only then can you truly say you survived, to genocide another day.

10/10 Would Genocide again.

A Game from 2005 to it's Progression of Today by TripWire is a Phenomenal Game of experience. With Plenty of Maps / Mods & DLC content to keep you Entertained & on your Feet for days. With Holiday Theme Specials, lots of Achievments & Packed full of Fully Loaded Weaponry. With 7 Perk Classes to choose from that can rank @ the highest level of 6; Field Medic, Support Specialist, Sharpshooter, Commando, Berserker, Firebug, & Demolition with their own playstyle of Weapons. There are plenty of Zeds to Kill that Ranges from Clots trying to eat your face, Gorefast(s) with a Machete like arm for slicing you up, Bloats who are Obese spcimens that Bile posion in your eyes that Blinds you & also burns your skin. Stalkers who are mearly invisible creatures that come from any corner, Scrake(s) who are very Tanky with a Chainsaw ready to swing at your every move. Husk(s) who have the perk of setting you & your suroundings on Fire & is almost Immune to Fire itself. Crawler(s) These buggy little guys will jump @ your face and also bite and naw you from the Ankles. These spider like creatures can be a pest & your worst Nightmare! Then you have the Siren watch out! she's a screamer. Get too close to her Scream radius and she will make you go deaf. Then we have the Fleshpound. You think Scrakes are bad? These guys are Highly Tanky with Drills for hands ready to rush @ you like a Quarter Back and Pound those Drills into your Flesh. There are also different Difficulty settings from Begginer to Hell on Earth also with waves ranging from 4 to 10. Depending on how many players are in a Server & what Difficulty is being played & how many Waves are set the more Zeds will appear and they will become Harder. With all that said. We come to the Boss after the Final Wave is complete. The Patriarch! The Patriarch is the final boss of Killing Floor; appearing in the final wave of each game. He is the most powerful and heavily armed specimen in the game, being equipped with a minigun, rocket launcher, a cloaking system and three single use of healing syringes. He is also the fastest runner in the game, easily outrunning all players and specimens, however he makes use of this after being injured either to run and heal or to retaliate against a specific player. There is also Zed Time in the game which @ random acts as Bullet Time during gameplay. There are also a lot of different Characters to Choose / Play from all distinguished to fit their own personality. This game is by far a 10/10 & I highly reccomend this Game to Everyone.

Для других игра может показаться и не очень, но хотелось чтобы люди пополняли и пополняли ряд этой игры, чтобы многие серверы не пустовали, а пополнялись игроками.

 Killing Floor is a great co-operative horde mode fps. Solid gameplay and it gives alot more entertainment than the majority of new releases these days. 
 If you're looking for a story/narrative with your game you won't find it here. There are mods that give a 'campaign' but bare in mind - these are just waves on a map with progressive sections.

 The main game at it's core is basically - kill waves / earn money / buy more guns - Repeat. On paper it doesn't sound that great but trust me after a couple of games you'll wonder where the time has gone. Enhance the whole experience by playing with friends.

KILLING FLOOR -  7.5 / 10

I was hesitant to buy this at first as I am not exactly a fan of horror. Sure, give me blood and guts, but don't give me anything that will haunt my mind and make me sleep with one eye open. And I have to admit, Killing Floor delivered in every aspect I could fathom.
First of all, while advertised as survival horror, whether or not it is actualy survival horror depends on the situation. Playing in easy mode as the Berserker or Support Specialist was just plain fun, whether vaporizing fifteen-strong hordes with a single clip or severing four heads at once with an impressively realistic katana. But the real horror comes into play when you select a difficulty that's far out of your depth. Your money falls short of the weapons you need, ammo seems to vanish with double speed, and you can sink three rounds into an enemy's head before it explodes. As you begin to feel weaker than you expected, you begin to fear the next wave that will only bring more enemies and more death. 
Co-op mode brings in a whole new level of play. You and three of your friends can willingly challenge yourselves with a higher difficulty and begin to rely on coordination and strategy rather than bullets. After all, each bullet only counts for so much when there are six specimens crowding your ally.
Now that Killing Floor 2 is on the way, well, this review may be a bit late, but for those looking to save a bit of money should without a doubt pick this up at once. And I look forward to the sequel; I will be able to truly appreciate the innovation after playing this obsessively.

[i]Killing Floor[/i] offre indubbiamente tutto quello che un appassionato di sparatutto cooperativi possa desiderare… e anche di più. Ondate di zombi da macellare in mille e uno modi diversi. Un sistema di classi spartano ma funzionale e gratificante. Un comparto grafico che anche i personal computer più antiquati possono reggere. Un pungente umorismo nero. Un perfetto accento britannico (ammesso che giochiate in inglese). Un mucchio di contenuti scaricabili che, nonostante le eventuali critiche, sono interamente opzionali. Eventi speciali in occasione delle festività. Insomma, cosa si può volere di più? Bosh bosh shoom shoom whallop, dosh!

If you are honestly looking for a quality zombie survival experience, this is not the game for you. I thought this game was amazingly fun for quite a while, I even tried to get some of my friends to play it, but the whole game got old pretty fast. As you can see, I have not played played this game for an extremely long time, but in just that time, I could already see quite a few problems with this game. First off is simply the quality, it feels old and pretty janky, granted it is from 2009, but then again Call of Duty World at War came out in 2008, and it's "Nazi Zombies" game mode is put together quite a bit better, and it's just a single game mode, whereas this is supposed to be a full game. I understand that Treyarch is a big name company, and possibly an unfair comparison to judge quality by, but if you're going to pay for a game, don't settle for one that provides only a mediocre experience. Secondly, the difficulty curve is insanely high. The easiest difficulty is honestly a joke, even solo, whereas every other difficulty is VASTLY harder. I don't just mean the last difficulties either, every difficulty except the easiest, basically requires a very skilled team to even play, not to mention how impossible it can get for a player that messes up early on. Part of the difficulty curve can probably be attributed to the fact that players are required to grind a huge amount before having any of the classes even be worth playing. My third and final reason is that it has taken the path of so many other games, in that it has become a shameless DLC dump. you literally have to buy nearly everything good in the game with real money, as well as many other useless cosmetic or character packs. Honestly if you want a good zombie survival game, every Call of Duty game that Treyarch has made since World at War is a much better deal than this game, not to mention that their zombie survival mode isn't even the whole game, yet it still does better.

Despite what the advertisements may say, this series is *not* survival horror. This is action horror. Or, more specifically, a "shoot zombies until you get tired of the genre" game.

It's a damn fun one, at that. Play it if you like blowing zombies away. Don't play it if you're looking for a scary experience.
